string.value: Told Scadur of what I learned from Jade. His face looks grim. He thinks something must have happened to the Snowman, and asks me to investigate the area where it appears. Could the truth be found around #b#m211040101##k?\n\nFound a clue. #b#u3108##k
Found a strange item near the town. It looks like a broken piece of something. It looks like ice.
Oh! Haven't we met before? Yes, of course, about Jade.\r\n#b#L0#I think Jade is not thinking normally like she usually does ever since the attack. Jade say that the Snowman attacked her first.#l

Hmm... that can't be right. Snowman never would attack a human being first. However, if Jade's story is true than this is no ordinary situation. Don't know what to think of it but it seems that the Snowman is angry. Will you investigate this for me?

I'm not quite sure myself. How could the Snowman, the owner of El Nath Mountain Range become so angry...? This is a big issue. We need to find the reason why. Try investigating near #b#m211040101##k, where #o8220001# is known to appear.
If the Snowman is angry, then this is no simple problem. The Snowman is the descendant of a spirit. If the Snowman is provoked in anyway, then a great avalanche may occur.
Have you found something?\r\n#b#L0#(Told Scadur about the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture.)#l
There was a reason after all! The Snowman is not violent.
If you ever find anything while walking around El Nath, please tell me.
